entries.description: Fix issue #291 AWS CLI did not assume role if it was set in the service connection
Fix corrupting lambda invocations with JSON payloads
Add sessiontoken field to allow extension to work with temp credentials generated by an external process
Add nodejs12.x and python3.8 Lambda runtimes
Rebranded from AWS VSTS Tools to AWS Toolkit for Azure DevOps
Output image tag from ECR Pull task per issue #315
Removed nodejs8.10 Lambda runtime as updates are now disabled
Remove "only override if files existed" from S3 upload as it was never properly hooked up
